tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE albums (
  album_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  album_name VARCHAR,
  release_date DATE,
  artist_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artist_genre (
    artist_id UUID,
    genre_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY (artist_id, genre_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(genre_id)
);
